rank - Variable in class Card
 
READY - Static variable in class CardGameMessage
Sent by a client to the server to indicate it is ready for a new game.
removeAllCards() - Method in class CardGamePlayer
Removes all cards from this player.
removeAllCards() - Method in class CardList
Removes all cards from this list.
removeCard(int) - Method in class CardList
Removes the card at the specified position in this list.
removeCard(Card) - Method in class CardList
Removes the first occurrence of the specified card from this list, if it is present.
removeCards(CardList) - Method in class CardGamePlayer
Removes the list of cards from this player, if they are held by this player.
